title: definevalue
author: definevalue
content: Make offers shipping only within states they are used but will come out clean. Make me reasonable offer one of the 6gpu mining boxes comes with no PSU.

comments.author: definevalue
comments.body: Quote from: definevalue on November 06, 2022, 01:26:16 PMMake offers shipping only within states they are used but will come out clean. Make me reasonable offer one of the 6gpu mining boxes comes with no PSU.No one interested in gpu mining anymore huh?

comments.author: P00P135
comments.body: Quote from: definevalue on November 12, 2022, 03:52:35 AMQuote from: definevalue on November 06, 2022, 01:26:16 PMMake offers shipping only within states they are used but will come out clean. Make me reasonable offer one of the 6gpu mining boxes comes with no PSU.No one interested in gpu mining anymore huh? You said reasonable offer, no one is looking to spend reasonable money in the current market.  Maybe let us know your rock bottom and someone might bite.

comments.author: WhyFhy
comments.body: Unfortunately, I think he's right I have a 2080ti on here for $200 vs it selling for $350 on eBay. Coiners are being very cautious at the moment, I can't say that I blame them.

comments.author: DaveF
comments.body: If you don't mind hunting around on FB marketplace or Craigslist at least around here (NY) you can get complete mining rigs for under $175 / card fully ready to go.Something like this with no power supply is probably going to cost more to ship then it's worth.You also have not said where you are, or posted pictures so you may have lost some potential views / offers because of that. But you can always add that info.-Dave

comments.author: definevalue
comments.body: Quote from: P00P135 on November 12, 2022, 10:43:38 AMQuote from: definevalue on November 12, 2022, 03:52:35 AMQuote from: definevalue on November 06, 2022, 01:26:16 PMMake offers shipping only within states they are used but will come out clean. Make me reasonable offer one of the 6gpu mining boxes comes with no PSU.No one interested in gpu mining anymore huh? You said reasonable offer, no one is looking to spend reasonable money in the current market.  Maybe let us know your rock bottom and someone might bite.Fair enough $300 for the 12GPU rig and $125 for each of the 6 gpu ones ?

I am in New Jersey what state are you in?I may want a 12 card rig.
